1370: Guido moved to Stoof straet.B.2 after marriage.
Got married to Yda at age 24 in 1370.
1372: Had a daughter with Yda, Waldrada, at age 26.
1374: Lost daughter Waldrada when Waldrada was 3 years old.
1376: Had a daughter with Yda, Iris, at age 30.
1377: Had a daughter with Yda, Oda, at age 31.
1378: Had a daughter with Yda, Volcwiif, at age 32.
1382: Had a daughter with Yda, Meynseth, at age 36.
1383: Had a son with Yda, Pieter, at age 37.
1385: Had a daughter with Yda, Saxiardis, at age 39.
1386: Had a son with Yda, Alard, at age 40.
1387: Had a son with Yda, Nanne, at age 41.
Lost son Nanne when Nanne was 1 years old.
1388: Had a son with Yda, Walwin, at age 42.
Lost son Walwin when Walwin was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1389: Lost daughter Meynseth when Meynseth was 8 years old.
